name: get_customer
description: Fetch customer details by phone number. Returns customer information including name, email, membership status, loyalty points, booking history, and total spending. Use this to check if a customer exists before creating a booking.

request_body_schema.description: Request body for fetching customer by phone number

properties.name: customer_phone
properties.description: Customer phone number (10 digits, can include country code or formatting - will be normalized automatically)
